name: A* Algorithm Project
description: Python project which applies an A* algorithm for finding an optimal path for a robot in a randomly generated 2D matrix.

name: Spotify Song Recommender
description: Basic implementation of a song analyser in C++. The song analyser facilitates diverse actions,  including song and artist recommendations, as well as generating songs’ rankings.

name: BookEat (Restaurants recommender app)
description: App design project produced with Figma of a Restaurant Recommender concept, adapted to users’ preferences.
